channel.title: Framework on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Framework Laptop 16 update brings Nvidia GeForce to the modular gaming laptop
item.description: Older Ryzen 7040-based model will stick around at $1,299 as a lower-end option.

item.title: Review: Framework Desktop is a mash-up of a regular desktop PC and the Mac Studio
item.description: Size matters most for Framework’s first stab at a desktop workstation/gaming PC.
